DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFSCR204bpf Past 30 Days No Sexual Activity Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of the reason(s) they did not have sexual activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days No Sexual Activity Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about the reasons why an individual did not have any sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
Concepts.definition: A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Had Difficulty with Orgasm or Climax
